name: File Saathi
description: Offline PDF manipulation tool for merge, split, protect, unlock, and audit-safe document handling. All processing happens locally on your machine.

name: Saathi 26AS Analysis Suite
description: Reconcile Form 26AS with client ledger and analyse the entire 26AS in seconds. Privacy-first, offline tool that flags TDS mismatches, compliance issues, and generates structured Excel audit reports.

name: LeaseWizard
description: Professional lease calculator for CAs and finance teams. Compute Lease Liability & ROU Asset values as per Ind AS 116 with detailed amortisation schedules and Excel/PDF export. Works 100% offline.
